ee.adit.service
Class DocumentService

java.lang.Object
  ee.adit.service.DocumentService

public class DocumentService
extends java.lang.Object

Implements business logic for document processing. Provides methods for processing documents (saving, retrieving, performing checks, etc.). Where possible, the actual data queries are forwarded to DAO classes.

Author:
Marko Kurm, Microlink Eesti AS, marko.kurm@microlink.ee, Jaak Lember, Interinx, jaak@interinx.com

checkAttachedDocumentMetadataForNewDocument

public void checkAttachedDocumentMetadataForNewDocument(SaveDocumentRequestAttachment document)
                                                 throws AditCodedException
Checks if document metadata is sufficient and correct for creating a new document.

Parameters:
document - document metadata
Throws:
AditCodedException - if metadata is insuffidient or incorrect

getValidDocumentTypes

public java.lang.String getValidDocumentTypes()
Retrieves a list of valid document types.

Returns:
List of valid document types as a comma separated list

deflateDocumentFile

public java.lang.String deflateDocumentFile(long documentId,
                                            long fileId,
                                            boolean markDeleted)
Defaltes document file. Replaces the data with MD5 hash.

Returns one of the following result codes:
"ok" - deflation succeeded
"already_deleted" - specified file is already deleted
"file_does_not_belong_to_document" - specified file does not belong to specified document
"file_does_not_exist" - specified file does not exist

Parameters:
documentId - document ID
fileId - file ID
markDeleted -
Returns:
Deflation result code.

addHistoryEvent

public void addHistoryEvent(java.lang.String applicationName,
                            Document doc,
                            java.lang.String userCode,
                            java.lang.String historyType,
                            java.lang.String xteeUserCode,
                            java.lang.String xteeUserName,
                            java.lang.String description,
                            java.lang.String userName)
Adds a document history event.

Parameters:
applicationName - remote application short name
doc - document
userCode - user code - the user that caused this event
historyType - history event type name
xteeUserCode - X-Tee user code
xteeUserName - X-Tee user name
description - event description

sendDocumentsToDVK

public int sendDocumentsToDVK()
Fetches all the documents that are to be sent to DVK. The DVK documents are recognized by the following:
1. The document has at least one DocumentSharing associated with it
2. That DocumentSharing must have the "documentSharingType" equal to "send_dvk"
3. That DocumentSharing must have the "documentDvkStatus" not initialized or set to "100"

receiveDocumentsFromDVK

@Transactional
public int receiveDocumentsFromDVK()
Transfers incoming documents from DVK Client database to ADIT database. Note: DVK stores the recipient status in the DHL_MESSAGE table (field RECIPIENT_STATUS_ID). The situation where two recipients from the same institution receive the same document, is not allowed (or at least DVK stores only one status ID for this document).

Returns:
the number of documents received

                                   throws java.lang.Exception

deleteDVKDocument

                              org.hibernate.Session session)

Parameters:

composeErrorResponse

public void composeErrorResponse(java.lang.Integer reasonCode,
                                 dvk.api.container.v2.ContainerVer2 dvkContainer,
                                 java.lang.String recipientCode,
                                 java.util.Date receivedDate,
                                 java.lang.String recipientName)
                          throws AditInternalException
Kui dokumendi sidumisel kasutajaga ilmnes, et kasutajat pole ADIT aktiivsete kasutajate hulgas, siis m√§rgitakse dokument DVKs katkestatuks ning algsele saatjale koostatakse automaatselt vastuskiri, milles on toodud kaaskirja dokument (muudetav ADIT haldaja poolt) ning algne dokument. Kui dokumendi adressaadiks on DVK kasutaja, siis talitatakse sarnaselt eeltoodule, kuna DVK kasutajad peavad suhtlema otse omavahel, mitte ADIT kaudu.

Throws:
AditInternalException

                                   throws java.lang.Exception

deleteDocument

@Transactional
public void deleteDocument(long documentId,
                                         java.lang.String userCode,
                                         java.lang.String applicationName)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
Marks document matching the given ID as deleted. Document file contents will be replaced with their MD5 hash codes. Document and individual files will be marked as "deleted".

Parameters:
documentId - ID of document to be deleted
userCode - Code of the user who executed current request
applicationName - Short name of application that executed current request
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

DeflateDocument

@Transactional
public void DeflateDocument(long documentId,
                                          java.lang.String userCode,
                                          java.lang.String applicationName)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
Deflates document matching the given ID. Deflation means that document file contents will be replaced with their MD5 hash codes. Document and individual files will be marked as "deflated".

Parameters:
documentId - ID of document to be deflated
userCode - Code of the user who executed current request
applicationName - Short name of application that executed current request
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

prepareSignature

public PrepareSignatureInternalResult prepareSignature(long documentId,
                                                       java.lang.String manifest,
                                                       java.lang.String country,
                                                       java.lang.String state,
                                                       java.lang.String city,
                                                       java.lang.String zip,
                                                       java.lang.String certFile,
                                                       java.lang.String digidocConfigFile,
                                                       java.lang.String temporaryFilesDir,
                                                       AditUser xroadUser)
                                                throws java.lang.Exception
Initializes signing of specified document.
Adds a pending signature to documents signature container and returns hash code of added signature. Returned hash code can be signed using ID-card in any user interface.

Parameters:
documentId - Document ID specifying which document should be signed
manifest - Role or resolution of signer
country - Country part of signers address
state - County/state part of signers address
city - City/town/village part of signers address
zip - Postal code of signers address
certFile - Absolute path to signers signing certificate file
digidocConfigFile - Absolute path tod digidoc configuration file
temporaryFilesDir - Absolute path to applications temporary files directory
xroadUser - AditUser who executed current request
Returns:
PrepareSignatureInternalResult that contains hash code of added signature and indication whether or not adding new signature succeeded.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

confirmSignature

public void confirmSignature(long documentId,
                             java.lang.String signatureFileName,
                             java.lang.String requestPersonalCode,
                             java.lang.String digidocConfigFile,
                             java.lang.String temporaryFilesDir)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
Adds user signature data to pending signature in specified documents signature container. After adding signature to container, gets a confirmation for signature from OCSP service.

Parameters:
documentId - Document ID specifying which document the users signature belongs to
signatureFileName - Absolute path to file containing users signature
requestPersonalCode - Personal ID code of the person who executed current request
digidocConfigFile - Absolute path tod digidoc configuration file
temporaryFilesDir - Absolute path to applications temporary files directory
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
